original_text: When I was with them, I did many great things. Nobody else ever did things like that. If I had not done those great things among them, they would not have known what is wrong. But they have seen what I did. As a result, they have hated me, and they have hated my Father too.
korean_text: 내가 아무도 못한 일을 그들 중에서 하지 아니하였더라면 그들에게 죄가 없었으려니와 지금은 그들이 나와 내 아버지를 보았고 또 미워하였도다

sentences.original_text: Nobody else ever did things like that
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 누구도 그런 일들을 하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: If I had not done those great things among them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들 중에서 그 큰 일들을 하지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: they would not have known what is wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 무엇이 잘못되었는지 알지 못했을 것이다

sentences.original_text: But they have seen what I did
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 내가 한 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: As a result, they have hated me
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 그들은 나를 미워하게 되었다

sentences.original_text: and they have hated my Father too
